show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 170 Pete Oberle on how to invest in lab grown regenerative meat
subtitle: 170 Pete Oberle on how to invest in lab grown regenerative meat
summary:
Pete Oberle, managing partner of Trailhead Capital, shares about his journey into investing and the latest investments they have made. Among them there is a regenerative cultivated lab-grown meat company.
